entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Light snow over southern sections early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
